formalText: I will see her next week.
Started by talking about an unknown hormonal thing going on with her and some other women that was sort of triggering that sort of response.
She doesn't even really know exactly what was either triggering or just going on yesterday.
Talks about how her hormones are not in her control right now and she can't really go in there and manipulate what her cells are doing.
Talked about how sad it was to lose Jen.
She said she felt very lonely being surrounded by business people all the time.
And then i was really hard in 6th grade when she started in a school that her parents just said was a language immersion school system.

She said, "If I was outside, then it meant that I was trying to prevent myself from crying in public as opposed to crying at home and it probably wasn't very helpful because you know, then all I want to do is just start hiding at home, so I won't go outside and cry in public".
Talked about moving schools a lot as a kid, and her easy and hard transitions.
She found high school extremely stressful.
Her big sister was a big influence on her growing up.
She said, "She's my sister and I love her but at the same time that I fully know that her influence  in some respects led me into great places but in other respects" they weren't good.
and I'm pretty sure my parents didn't really realize how much because I wasn't very talkative about things"
